change.item: Revised to update encoding by Samira Bozorgi
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Portuguese Subject Collection)//EN" "reg_097.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Portuguese Subject Collection, 1970-1991
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Pamphlets, leaflets, and serial issues, relating to the Portuguese revolution of 1974, and to Portuguese foreign relations, trade unions, and armed forces.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Portuguese Subject Collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1975.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

odd.p: Brochures, flyers, leaflets, newspaper issues, poem, and speeches relating to the political and social history of Portugal, arranged chronologically and then alphabetically by subject.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: See card catalog for increments that may have been received after Dec. 1994.

did.unittitle: Economy. Speeches by Minister of Agriculture Vasco Lesnidas, 1970, relating to Portuguese labor. In Portuguese
Foreign policy. Speech by Ambassador to Brazil Josi Manuel Fragoso, 1970, relating to Portuguese foreign policy. In Portuguese
Miscellany. Poem by Jaime Cortesco, n.d. (in Portuguese), and pamphlet issued by Radio Portugal-Lisbon, n.d. (in English)
1974. Newspaper issues and flyers relating to the Revolution of April 1974. In Portuguese
Communist Party. Flyers and leaflets, 1974-1975. Includes flyers by splinter-groups. In Portuguese
Eanes, Ramalho. Speech by President Eanes, 1976. In Portuguese
Elections- 1991. Newspaper issues and brochures, 1990-1991, issued by the Socialist Party of President Mario Soares for the presidential election of January 13, 1991. In Portuguese
